worksData.title: Arval ShowCase
worksData.subtitle: The F3 Store made to illustrate all the project, product and service available
worksData.body: Development of a showcase site for the company BNP Arval, in order to promote the various projects and services offered internally. The goal was to have a CRUD system to feed content. Using Strapi for the backend was a quick and efficient solution. I had an imperative, to integrate the Arval design system developed with tailwind css which I had to integrate using the Angular framework.

worksData.title: Photograph portfolio
worksData.subtitle: Made to illustrate my photographic creations
worksData.body: Resulting from a study project, I modified it in order to illustrate my many photographs of which I am passionate. My many travels have allowed me to discover magnificent landscapes and I like to capture these delicious moments where time is frozen forever.

worksData.title: Secours catholique
worksData.subtitle: An associative site to promote the actions of the association of the popular relief of the city of Saint Cyr l'Ecole
worksData.body: Project carried out as a volunteer to help the association in its communication and the sharing of these actions and thanks

worksData.title: Craftsman carpenter
worksData.subtitle: A showcase made to illustrate the services of a craftsman
worksData.body: A site developed on behalf of a craftsman who wishes to highlight the services offered online and gain visibility
